thread.section_title: Goldtop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of goldtop.co.uk
thread.title: Mr Walters

author: Mr Walters
title: Mr Walters
text:
Called to check Shipping info before I ordered from the website. The gentleman I spoke to was polite, knowledgeable and answered all my questions. He thanked me for my order before I'd even placed it :)
I bought the jumper, the flat tracker gloves and some wool lined gauntlets. These were delivered on a next day service, sooner than I expected.
The quality of the items is fantastic with good attention to detail and a correct fit for advertised size, something of a novelty these days.
I would recommend Goldtop without hesitation and look forward to using them in the future - try them, you won't be disappointed.
